County Clare is lighting up today with solid 14 ft @ 16s W swell and light SSE winds at 9 mph. Best spots include Crab Island and Doolin Point, both offering great windows throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 8 ft @ 14s W with fresh S winds at 15 mph, still workable at various locations. By the day after, conditions decline further to 4 ft @ 9s WSW with stronger winds making it less inviting. Best: today.
